page.title: 07COMMUNICATIONS
page.content: British Telecom N.I. and the Royal Mail provide the services of postal and telecommunications in our area. Rathenraw and Stiles are the 2 local housing estates.Both are quite recently built,yet neither has a{sub {post office.} Each estate has a single post box with 2 collections 6 days a week.Each estate also has a single{telephone box but these are often vandalised. Large numbers of people have private telephones. Almost every home has a television set and a radio with which they can keep in touch with national and local news.
